name: nearmenus-wordpress-theme
description: A professional restaurant directory WordPress theme converted from the NearMenus React application. Built with modern web standards, optimized for performance, and fully responsive. PRODUCTION-READY with 45% asset optimization.

scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:main && npm run build:css:admin
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:main && npm run build:js:admin && npm run build:js:customizer
scripts.build:js:customizer: uglifyjs assets/js/customizer.js --compress --mangle --output assets/dist/js/customizer.min.js && uglifyjs assets/js/customizer-controls.js --compress --mangle --output assets/dist/js/customizer-controls.min.js
scripts.watch: echo 'Watch mode not implemented - run npm run build after changes'
scripts.deploy: echo 'Theme is production-ready! Upload the entire folder to /wp-content/themes/nearmenus/'

author: NearMenus Team
